channel.title: CVE Feed for themeisle -- Visualizer: Tables and Charts Manager for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for themeisle -- Visualizer: Tables and Charts Manager for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2024-3750|2024-05-16T02:36:48.950Z -- themeisle -- Visualizer: Tables and Charts Manager for WordPress
item.description: The Visualizer: Tables and Charts Manager for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification and retrieval of data due to a missing capability check on the getQueryData() function in all versions up to, and including, 3.10.15. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to perform arbitrary SQL queries that can be leveraged for privilege escalation among many other actions.
